channel.title: PI New SKill ERROR PLEASE HELP
channel.description: Hello i added a new skill followign this tut and everything is working but the client crashes when i add my tab and i get this error The system cannot find the path specified. hehe-scape PvP is loading.. Loaded 525 graphics... Testing Loaded the flo. 602 NPC Amount: 11257 Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36 sendPacket185(29156) Exception in thread "Thread-5" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.drawInterface(client.java:9477) at client.drawInterface(client.java:9523) at client.drawTabArea(client.java:2752) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:9334) at client.processDrawing(client.java:10174) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:5752) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

item.title: PI New SKill ERROR PLEASE HELP
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

Well,examine the error… There’s something obviously wrong in client.java. What does it say next to it? drawInterface. Interface should be a BIG clue. If you added an interface that’s whats giving you the error. I don’t mean to be a jackass when I said that, just want you to learn. As much as this is a helping community, its also a learning one

Read full topic
item.source: PI New SKill ERROR PLEASE HELP

item.title: PI New SKill ERROR PLEASE HELP
item.dc:creator: @king_he_he king he he
item.description:
@king_he_he wrote:

Hello i added a new skill followign this tut and everything is working but the client crashes when i add my tab and i get this error The system cannot find the path specified.
hehe-scape PvP is loading…
Loaded 525 graphics…
Testing
Loaded the flo.
602 NPC Amount: 11257
Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36
sendPacket185(29156)
Exception in thread “Thread-5” java.lang.NullPointerException
at client.drawInterface(client.java:9477)
at client.drawInterface(client.java:9523)
at client.drawTabArea(client.java:2752)
at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:9334)
at client.processDrawing(client.java:10174)
at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108)
at client.run(client.java:5752)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
